title: Won’t Give In
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>….No matter how much you ask me, I won’t give in, Ai-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>No matter what you say, Ai is not backing down on this either, Setsu<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Gggghhh~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Gggghhh~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Like I said! We’re the ones that are going to organize your birthday next month!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>No way! It’s Ai’s birthday, so Ai will be the one that host it and entertain everyone!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I cannot allow that! Please let us be the one to celebrate you!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ai said Ai will do it--!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Huff huff….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Huff huff….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I-, I got it~ We’ll hold your birthday twice, one will be held by us, and the other will be held by you…. How does that sound….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ai accept! Ai will definitely make it a blast of a party!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>We’re also going to make a party that will get you so moved to the point of crying, so make sure to look forward to it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Alright then, you’re on~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
